Text.Language: Ctulloc e~terouwini: pe Maria ]paryenoc.
A pillar of light: is Mary the virgin.

Cunterbin e~tai paryenoc: han y~metennec n~tecparyenia.
Patient is the Virgin / and beautiful is her virginity.

For this, our Savior / raised her up to His kingdom.

Af] nac n~nia~gayon: n/e~te m~pe bal nau e~rwou.
He has given her good things / which no eye has seen.

Nyo gar pe purgoc et[oci: kata p~caji m~picovoc.
For you are the high tower / according to the words of the wise.

Nyo gar a~l/yinon: piman~selet n~kayaroc.

Maria v~rasi n~niaggeloc: Maria p~sousou n~nia~poctoloc.
